publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1489.3 Mike Rumbles: OECD Review of Scotland’s Rural Policy—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1489) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "considers that the Scottish Government’s cut in funding for rural development and affordable housing does not match the OECD report’s recommendations, and therefore calls on the Scottish Government to bring forward substantive measures to tackle rural housing shortages such as Community Land Trust schemes, an extension of the Croft House Grant Scheme and the development of redundant farm land for affordable housing." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
